text: KXBB (101.7 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Cienega Springs, Arizona. The station is owned by Sanford and Terry Cohen, through licensee River Rat Radio, LLC, and airs a blues format. The station was assigned the KXBB call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on January 7, 2019. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * XBB Category:Radio stations established in 2019 Category:2019 establishments in Arizona Category:Blues radio stations Category:La Paz County, Arizona
title: KXBB
